title: Night & Weekend Setback
trigger: Base load at night/weekend > 30% of weekday daytime
desc: Reduce after-hours HVAC/ventilation to setback levels using schedules.

title: LED Retrofit + Controls
trigger: Old fluorescent/halogen or high lighting intensity vs benchmark
desc: Replace fixtures with LED and add occupancy/daylight sensors.

title: Variable Frequency Drives for Pumps/Fans
desc: Install VFDs to modulate speed to actual demand.

title: Compressed Air Leak Detection & Repair
desc: Survey for leaks and fix, add maintenance routine.

title: Insulation & Envelope Improvements
desc: Insulate roof/walls, seal infiltration, upgrade glazing (phased).
